intro: Couepia guianensis subsp. glandulosa, commonly known as the glandular couepia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly in Guyana and northern Brazil. The flowers are usually yellow or orange, and the plant produces capsule fruits that contain several seeds.
